title: J24 Unlocked Smartphone, 6.5” HD+ Display, 4G LTE, Android 14, Octa-Core, 3GB RAM + 32GB Storage (Expandable 256GB), 3000mAh Battery, Dual SIM, Type-C, Includes Charger & Case
description: J24 Handset – Reliable Performance, Seamless Connectivity Stay connected with the J24 Handset, a feature-packed smartphone designed for everyday use. With 4G LTE support across multiple US bands, a large 6.517” HD+ display, and Android 14, the J24 delivers smooth performance and a user-friendly experience at an affordable price. 🔹 Stunning 6.5” HD+ Display Enjoy crisp visuals and vibrant colors on the 6.517” HD+ LCD screen, making it perfect for browsing, streaming, and gaming. The capacitive multi-touch display ensures responsive and effortless navigation. 🚀 Smooth & Efficient Performance Powered by an Octa-core processor (up to 1.6GHz), 3GB RAM, and Android 14 full version, the J24 offers fast and reliable multitasking. With 32GB internal storage (expandable up to 256GB), you’ll have ample space for your apps, photos, and files. 📸 Capture & Connect with Dual Cameras The J24 is equipped with 5MP front and rear cameras, allowing you to take clear photos and make high-quality video calls. The built-in flashlight ensures great shots even in low-light conditions. 🔋 All-Day Battery Life Stay powered up with the 3000mAh battery, providing hours of talk time and daily use. The USB Type-C port ensures quick and convenient charging with the included 1A charger and Type-C cable. 📶 Strong Connectivity & Essential Features 4G LTE support for seamless calling, texting, and browsing Dual nano SIM + microSD slot for flexibility and expanded storage Bluetooth 4.2, GPS, and 3.5mm headphone jack for easy connectivity Durable plastic body with a TPU silicone case included for protection 🎁 Everything You Need in the Box! With your J24 Handset, you’ll receive a 1A charger, Type-C cable, and a TPU silicone case, so you’re ready to go right out of the box. Upgrade to the J24 Handset for a reliable, feature-rich, and budget-friendly smartphone experience! 🚀📱
